name: Happy Merge Decoration
description:
Merge, renovation and decoration, have you tried such a sweet merge home game before? It’s time to use your talents for house designing and item merging. Merge, decorate, unlock new houses, renovate the house and make it fantasy! This game will be your best choice!

Game Features:
1. Easy to learn, understand at a glance, everyone can get started quickly
2. Merge various items to decorate your house
3. Different furniture options, a variety of furnitures matching
4. Unlock surprise reward chests
5. Merge more premium special items
6. Extra golden coin rewards to help you complete tasks quickly
7. Constantly updated game content

How to play:
- By merging two identical items, you can get more advanced items;
- Complete the corresponding tasks, you can choose unique furniture for the house;
- Select different decoration styles for your room, satisfy all your home fantasies;
- Finish the house decoration and start the next exploration of different locations!

Ready for the merge challenge? Have you imagined how to design your dream home? Play it now and enjoy this amazing game!
